title: Raw ID
description: The unique identifier for the raw, unprocessed version of a media object.

title: Media Type
description: The general type of the media (e.g., image, video, text).

title: Raw MIME Type
description: The specific MIME type of the raw media data (e.g., 'image/jpeg').

title: Canonical ID
description: The identifier for the canonical, standardized representation of a media object.

title: Canonical MIME Type
description: The MIME type of the canonical representation.

title: File Name
description: The original file name of the media object.

title: Bounds
description: The spatial or temporal boundary of the entire media object.

title: Segment Of
description: Links a segment to the larger media object it belongs to.

title: Segment Type
description: Specifies the method or type of segmentation (e.g., 'polygon', 'bbox').

title: Segment Definition
description: Contains the actual data defining the segment (e.g., coordinates, timecodes).

title: Segment Bounds
description: The spatial or temporal boundary of a specific segment.

title: Query Distance
description: Represents the calculated distance or similarity score of an item to a query, often used in search results.

title: Preview ID
description: The identifier for a preview version (e.g., thumbnail) of a media object.

title: Same URI Prefix
description: Relates resources that share the same base URI up to the last path segment.

title: Spatially Contains
description: Asserts that the subject spatial segment geometrically contains the object spatial segment.

title: Spatially Within
description: Asserts that the subject spatial segment is geometrically within the object spatial segment.

title: Spatially Intersects
description: Asserts that the subject and object spatial segments geometrically intersect.

title: Spatially Overlaps
description: Asserts that the subject and object spatial segments geometrically overlap (intersect but one does not contain the other).

title: Spatially Equals
description: Asserts that the subject and object spatial segments are geometrically identical.

title: Spatially Covers
description: Asserts that the subject spatial segment geometrically covers the object spatial segment (every point of the object is a point of the subject, and their interiors intersect).

title: Average Color
description: Computes the average color of an image.

title: CLIP Embedding
description: Generates a CLIP embedding for an image.

title: OCR
description: Performs Optical Character Recognition on an image or document.

title: CLIP 2-Nearest Neighbors
description: Finds the 2-nearest neighbors of an image based on CLIP embeddings.

title: CLIP 3-Nearest Neighbors
description: Finds the 3-nearest neighbors of an image based on CLIP embeddings.

title: CLIP 4-Nearest Neighbors
description: Finds the 4-nearest neighbors of an image based on CLIP embeddings.

title: CLIP Near Duplicate
description: Identifies near-duplicate images based on CLIP embeddings and a cosine distance threshold.

title: Segment Sibling
description: Identifies sibling segments of a media object.
